What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: Through the course, I learned a significant amount of new vocabulary in a relatively short time period and solidified my grammar in French.

The instructor was not a native speaker, however she was really nice and helped to create a familiar and relaxed atmosphere in the class, which helped students enjoy the course.
Watching many French movies was helpful to solidify the students' French skills.
This course is helpful, but I wish it could have been a little more hands on and/or regimented (daily quizzes, etc.)
I would recommend taking L5 from the start instead of choosing L1 through L3 if you can because it is more relaxed but you still learn much.
